head.title: Welcome to the Nicotine Remedies website

about.title: About Us
about.heading: Meet HINIC - the number one nicotine supplier!
about.minititle: We have experience - We focus on development
about.text-one: HINIC can be your number one online supplier of pure nicotine. Our product is tailored to meet the growing needs of entrepreneurs in need of high quality USP-grade Premium Nicotine that can be used in a range of products such as nicotine patches, chewing gum and liquids prepared and used specifically for use in electronic cigarettes.
about.text-two: HINIC offers only the purest nicotine, while giving a fair and appropriate price for your business.

products.title: Our Offer
products.header: We offer professional nicotine products to meet the growing market demand and customers with different requirements.

order.text-one: We put the welfare of our customers first. Our prices are adjusted to satisfy our consumers. As a supplier, we want to give our customers the chance to earn even more than before by giving them more competitive prices. With our friendly and professional team working together with you, Hiliq Poland offers you quality you will be very satisfied with.
order.text-two: The Hinic Poland team strives to make our customers part of everything we do. From product ordering to delivery, we monitor the entire process, so you will be able to wait for delivery with complete confidence in our services and capabilities.
